item.title: Need help with item wielding or whatever
item.dc:creator: @K_F_C K F C
item.description:
@K_F_C wrote:

Hello I was wondering if anyone could help me with my spirit shields I added, I’ve added them and all except when I wield them… it shows as a weapon i’ve tried to fix it but it doesn’t work… If someone could help me i would appreciate it :
Thanks

here’s a screenshot

i put this code in my class8 for the shields

if(i == 9003) // ItemID
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.anInt174 = 8002;
class8.anInt181 = 1670;
class8.anInt190 = 336;
class8.anInt198 = 64;
class8.anInt204 = 97;
class8.anInt169 = 3;
class8.anInt194 = 37;
class8.anInt165 = 9002;
class8.anInt200 = 9002;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Elysian”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “It’s a shield.”.getBytes();
}

Read full topic
